dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for image classification containing more than 1.2 million training images and 50,000 validation images, widely used in academic research.
dcterms:title: ImageNet

dcterms:description: A popular large-scale benchmark dataset for object detection and instance segmentation tasks, consisting of images from 80 different categories and 115,000 training images.
dcterms:title: COCO
